00036 /* --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00037  --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00038  --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00039 AST ASSUMPTION REDUCTION FUNCTIONS
00040 - Do reductions of constant expressions
00041  --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00042  --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00043  --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00044 
00045 info_ast_visit_t *reduceAST_traverse_node(ast_node_t *node, ast_node_t *from, int position_idx);
00046 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00047  * (function: newConstantNode)
00048  *-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00049 void optimizations_on_AST(ast_node_t *top)
00050 {
00051         reduceAST_traverse_node(top, NULL, -1);
00052 }
00053 
00054 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00055  * (function: reduceAST_traverse_node)
00056  *-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00057 info_ast_visit_t *reduceAST_traverse_node(ast_node_t *node, ast_node_t *from, int position_idx)
00058 {
00059         int i;
00060         info_ast_visit_t *node_details = NULL;
00061         info_ast_visit_t **children_info = NULL;
00062         short free_myself = FALSE;
00063 
00064         if (node == NULL)
00065         {
00066                 /* print out the node and label details */
00067                 return NULL;
00068         }
00069         else
00070         {
00071                 switch(node->type)
00072                 {
00073                         default:
00074                                 break;
00075                 }       
00076 
00077                 /* allocate the information for all the returned children info */
00078                 children_info = (info_ast_visit_t**)malloc(sizeof(info_ast_visit_t*)*node->num_children);       
00079 
00080                 /* traverse all the children */
00081                 for (i = 0; i < node->num_children; i++)
00082                 {
00083                         /* recursively call through the tree going to each instance.  This is depth first search. */
00084                         children_info[i] = reduceAST_traverse_node(node->children[i], node, i);
00085                 }
00086 
00087                 /* post process the children */
00088                 switch(node->type)
00089                 {
00090                         default:
00091                                 break;
00092                 }
00093 
00094                 /* clean up the allocations in the downward traversal */
00095                 for (i = 0; i < node->num_children; i++)
00096                 {
00097                         if(children_info[i] != NULL)
00098                                 free(children_info[i]);
00099                 }
00100                 if (children_info != NULL)
00101                         free(children_info);
00102 
00103                 if (free_myself == TRUE)
00104                         /* remove the node */
00105                         free_child_in_tree(from, position_idx);
00106         }
00107 
00108         return node_details;
00109 }
00110 
00111 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00112  * (function: constantFold)
00113  *-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00114 info_ast_visit_t *constantFold(ast_node_t *node)
00115 {
00116         int i;
00117         info_ast_visit_t *node_details = NULL;
00118         info_ast_visit_t **children_info = NULL;
00119         short free_myself = FALSE;
00120 
00121         if (node == NULL)
00122         {
00123                 /* print out the node and label details */
00124                 return NULL;
00125         }
00126         else
00127         {
00128                 switch(node->type)
00129                 {
00130                         case NUMBERS:
00131                                 /* we're looking for constant expression reductions */
00132 
00133                                 /* allocate the return  structure */
00134                                 node_details = (info_ast_visit_t*)calloc(1, sizeof(info_ast_visit_t));  
00135                                 oassert(node_details);
00136 
00137                                 /* check if it's a constant depending on the number type */
00138                                 switch (node->types.number.base)
00139                                 {
00140                                         case(DEC):
00141                                                 if (node_details->value != -1)
00142                                                 {
00143                                                         node_details->is_constant = TRUE;
00144                                                         node_details->value = node->types.number.value;
00145                                                 }
00146                                                 break;
00147                                         case(HEX):
00148                                                 if (node_details->value != -1)
00149                                                 {
00150                                                         node_details->is_constant = TRUE;
00151                                                         node_details->value = node->types.number.value;
00152                                                 }
00153                                                 break;
00154                                         case(OCT):
00155                                                 if (node_details->value != -1)
00156                                                 {
00157                                                         node_details->is_constant = TRUE;
00158                                                         node_details->value = node->types.number.value;
00159                                                 }
00160                                                 break;
00161                                         case(BIN):
00162                                                 if (node_details->value != -1)
00163                                                 {
00164                                                         node_details->is_constant = TRUE;
00165                                                         node_details->value = node->types.number.value;
00166                                                 }
00167                                                 break;
00168                                         case(LONG_LONG):
00169                                                 node_details->is_constant = TRUE;
00170                                                 node_details->value = node->types.number.value;
00171                                                 break;
00172                                 }
00173                                 
00174                                 if (node_details->is_constant == TRUE)
00175                                 {
00176                                         /* if this is a constant then set up all the other information in the return */ 
00177                                         node_details->me = node;
00178                                         node_details->from = NULL;
00179                                 }
00180                                 else
00181                                 {
00182                                         free(node_details);
00183                                         node_details = NULL;
00184                                 }
00185                                 break;
00186                 }       
00187 
00188                 /* allocate the information for all the returned children info */
00189                 children_info = (info_ast_visit_t**)malloc(sizeof(info_ast_visit_t*)*node->num_children);       
00190 
00191                 /* traverse all the children */
00192                 for (i = 0; i < node->num_children; i++)
00193                 {
00194                         /* recursively call through the tree going to each instance.  This is depth first search. */
00195                         children_info[i] = constantFold(node->children[i]);
00196                 }
00197 
00198                 /* post process the children */
00199                 switch(node->type)
00200                 {
00201                         case UNARY_OPERATION:
00202                                 if ((children_info[0] != NULL) 
00203                                         && (children_info[0]->is_constant == TRUE))
00204                                 {
00205                                         /* check if we can do a reduction */
00206                                         long long new_value;
00207                                         short is_reduction = TRUE;
00208                                         /* IF can reduce to number constant */
00209                                         ast_node_t *new_node;
00210                                         
00211                                         /* do the operation and store in new node */    
00212                                         switch (node->types.operation.op)
00213                                         {
00214                                                 case LOGICAL_NOT:
00215                                                         new_value = !children_info[0]->value;
00216                                                         break;
00217                                                 case BITWISE_NOT:
00218                                                         new_value = ~children_info[0]->value;
00219                                                         break;
00220                                                 case MINUS:
00221                                                         new_value = -children_info[0]->value;
00222                                                         break;
00223                                                 default:
00224                                                         is_reduction = FALSE;
00225                                         }
00226 
00227                                         if (is_reduction == TRUE)
00228                                         {
00229                                                 node_details = (info_ast_visit_t*)calloc(1, sizeof(info_ast_visit_t));  
00230                                                 /* store details about the node */
00231                                                 node_details->is_constant_folded = TRUE;
00232                                                 node_details->me = node;
00233 
00234                                                 /* create the new node */
00235                                                 new_node = create_tree_node_long_long_number(new_value, node->line_number, node->file_number);
00236 
00237                                                 /* record that this node can be eliminated */
00238                                                 free_myself = TRUE;
00239                 
00240                                                 /* replaces from to this new number */
00241                                                 node_details->from = new_node;
00242                                         }
00243                                 }
00244                                 break;
00245                         case BINARY_OPERATION:
00246                                 if ((children_info[0] != NULL) 
00247                                         && (children_info[1] != NULL)
00248                                         && (children_info[0]->is_constant == TRUE) 
00249                                         && (children_info[1]->is_constant == TRUE))
00250                                 {
00251                                         /* check if we can do a reduction */
00252                                         long long new_value;
00253                                         short is_reduction = TRUE;
00254                                         /* IF can reduce to number constant */
00255                                         ast_node_t *new_node;
00256                                         
00257                                         /* do the operation and store in new node */    
00258                                         switch (node->types.operation.op)
00259                                         {
00260                                                 case ADD:
00261                                                         new_value = children_info[0]->value + children_info[1]->value;
00262                                                         break;
00263                                                 case MINUS:
00264                                                         new_value = children_info[0]->value - children_info[1]->value;
00265                                                         break;
00266                                                 case MULTIPLY:
00267                                                         new_value = children_info[0]->value * children_info[1]->value;
00268                                                         break;
00269                                                 case BITWISE_XOR:
00270                                                         new_value = children_info[0]->value ^ children_info[1]->value;
00271                                                         break;
00272                                                 case BITWISE_XNOR:
00273                                                         new_value = ~(children_info[0]->value ^ children_info[1]->value);
00274                                                         break;
00275                                                 case BITWISE_AND:
00276                                                         new_value = children_info[0]->value & children_info[1]->value;
00277                                                         break;
00278                                                 case BITWISE_NAND:
00279                                                         new_value = ~(children_info[0]->value & children_info[1]->value);
00280                                                         break;
00281                                                 case BITWISE_OR:
00282                                                         new_value = children_info[0]->value | children_info[1]->value;
00283                                                         break;
00284                                                 case BITWISE_NOR:
00285                                                         new_value = ~(children_info[0]->value | children_info[1]->value);
00286                                                         break;
00287                                                 case SL:
00288                                                         new_value = children_info[0]->value << children_info[1]->value;
00289                                                         break;
00290                                                 case SR:
00291                                                         new_value = children_info[0]->value >> children_info[1]->value;
00292                                                         break;
00293                                                 case LOGICAL_AND:
00294                                                         new_value = children_info[0]->value && children_info[1]->value;
00295                                                         break;
00296                                                 case LOGICAL_OR:
00297                                                         new_value = children_info[0]->value || children_info[1]->value;
00298                                                         break;
00299                                                 default:
00300                                                         is_reduction = FALSE;
00301                                         }
00302 
00303                                         if (is_reduction == TRUE)
00304                                         {
00305                                                 node_details = (info_ast_visit_t*)calloc(1, sizeof(info_ast_visit_t));  
00306                                                 /* store details about the node */
00307                                                 node_details->is_constant_folded = TRUE;
00308                                                 node_details->me = node;
00309 
00310                                                 /* create the new node */
00311                                                 new_node = create_tree_node_long_long_number(new_value, node->line_number, node->file_number);
00312         
00313                                                 /* record that this node can be eliminated */
00314                                                 free_myself = TRUE;
00315 
00316                                                 /* return from to this new number */
00317                                                 node_details->from = new_node;
00318                                         }
00319                                 }
00320 
00321                                 break;
00322                 }
00323 
00324                 /* clean up the allocations in the downward traversal */
00325                 for (i = 0; i < node->num_children; i++)
00326                 {
00327                         if(children_info[i] != NULL)
00328                                 free(children_info[i]);
00329                 }
00330                 if (children_info != NULL)
00331                         free(children_info);
00332 
00333                 if (free_myself == TRUE)
00334                         /* remove the node */
00335                         free_ast_node(node);
00336         }
00337 
00338         return node_details;
00339 }
